short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a verse from the Quran every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stay connected with the teachings of Islam throughout the day! The 30 Seconds of Islam Chrome Extension brings a new Quranic verse and its English translation every time you open a new tab. Listen to beautiful recitations from your favorite reciters, and customize your viewing experience with a toggle for dark and light themes.

New Features:

Khatma Mode: Progress through the entire Quran verse by verse, and track your completion with the number of completed khatma displayed in the settings.
Reciter Selection: Choose from a variety of renowned Quran reciters to enhance your listening experience.
Improved UI: A sleek and user-friendly settings modal to easily manage your preferences.
Enhance your spiritual practice and strengthen your connection with Allah (SWT) today!
